casebody.data:
WYNN RESORTS, LIMITED and Steve A. Wynn, Petitioners,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Elizabeth Goff Gonzalez, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Kazuo Okada; Universal Entertainment Corporation ; and Aruze USA, Inc., Real Parties in Interest. No. 74591 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED FEBRUARY 06, 2018

Deny.
